Title: Relates to the proper collection and disposal of mercury thermostats
Summary: Relates to the proper collection and disposal of mercury thermostats; establishes a fund for the stewardship of mercury thermostats; extends the effectiveness of the mercury thermostat collection act.
LawCode: Amd Art 27 Title 29 §§27-2901 - 27-2913, En Con L; add §92-kk, St Fin L; amd §4, Chap 550 of 2013
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the state finance law, in relation to the proper collection and disposal of mercury thermostats; and to amend chapter 550 of the laws of 2013, amending the environmental conservation law relating to establishing the mercury thermostat collection act, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
